name: Space Domain Awareness
description: SDA battle drills tying sensors, data fusion, and commander updates together.

cards.title: CSpOC Conjunction Workflow
cards.description: Rehearse the 72/48/24-hour conjunction warning process, including CDM parsing, risk assessment, and commander recommendation templates. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Own the conjunction workflow so commanders get timely maneuver calls.

cards.title: Sensor Tasking Matrix
cards.description: Build prioritized sensor tasking for GSSAP, SBSS, GEODSS, and allied telescopes, balancing custody gaps with weather and maintenance windows. Ref: AFI 14-133.
cards.summaryText: Task SDA sensors like a maestro so no object falls out of custody.

cards.title: Custody Confidence Metrics
cards.description: Calculate Track ID quality, covariance growth, and observation age to justify custody status in the Space Order of Battle. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Quantify SDA custody instead of relying on gut feel.

cards.title: Threat Characterization Drill
cards.description: Fuse signatures, maneuver history, and intel cues to categorize potential adversary RPO behavior within the Joint Space Tasking Order. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Translate SDA tracks into threat calls the JSpOC can act on.

cards.title: Catalog Maintenance Battle Drill
cards.description: Execute add/change/delete actions with 18 SDS ensuring orbital elements and owner data stay authoritative. Ref: AFMAN 14-117.
cards.summaryText: A pristine catalog underpins every SDA decision.

cards.title: Blue Force Tracking Updates
cards.description: Verify friendly object ephemerides, statuses, and asset tags before each Space Tasking Order release. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Keep blue force space tracks clean so targeting stays deconflicted.

cards.title: Battle Management Cell Sync
cards.description: Practice condensing SDA picture for the Space Battle Management Cell, highlighting threats, mitigation options, and risk to mission. Ref: SDP 3-0.
cards.summaryText: Deliver crisp SDA updates that commanders can trust in the fight.

cards.title: Coalition Data Exchange
cards.description: Review SSA sharing agreements, releasability markings, and allied sensor data pipelines before joint events. Ref: Combined Space Ops Vision 2031.
cards.summaryText: Protect sources while still delivering SDA clarity to partners.

cards.title: Space Event Debrief Template
cards.description: Build after-action packages that capture timeline, sensor data, COAs, and lessons learned after any significant SDA event. Ref: AFI 90-1601.
cards.summaryText: Debriefs turn single events into better future SDA decisions.

cards.title: Spectrum Interference Correlation
cards.description: Correlate RF interference reports with orbital tracks, payload pointing, and threat libraries to confirm attribution. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Link jamming complaints to real objects inside minutes.

cards.title: Sensor Calibration Log
cards.description: Track calibration status for radar and optical sensors, ensuring measurement biases are removed from the catalog. Ref: AFMAN 14-117.
cards.summaryText: Calibration drift quietly wrecks custody—stay ahead of it.

cards.title: Orbital Debris Reporting
cards.description: Practice completing USSPACECOM debris notifications, including size estimate, delta-V, and risk statements. Ref: Space Track Catalog CONOPS.
cards.summaryText: Rapid debris reporting keeps allies informed and assets safe.
